written_book_content.author: Factory Builder
written_book_content.title: Factory Builder
pages:
["
",[{"text":"  Factory Builder","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"gold","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"            by devilexe3","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
","
","
","
",[{"text":"    A book about all","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"    there is about","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"    this minigame.","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
"]

[[{"text":"^","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false,"clickEvent":{"action":"change_page","value":"2"}},{"text":"     TUTORIAL","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"You can go to your plot by using 
     ","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false},{"text":"/trigger plot","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":true}],"
","
",[{"text":"You can buy stuff using the shop (nether star)","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"You can only place tiles when you are strictly inside your plot","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
"]

[[{"text":"You can only destroy tiles with the Destroy Tool","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"Generators create different items which can be crafted into other items more valuable","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"Items can be moved around with conveyors, elevators and chutes","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
"]

[[{"text":"Items can only be sold with Selling Platforms","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"You can flip tile orientation by crouching","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"Your plot gets automatically saved when you leave","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"If you don't know how to get started, check out the plot at spawn","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
"]

[[{"text":"Trigger commands:","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"/trigger spawn","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"/trigger plot","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"/trigger spec","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"/trigger shrink","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"/trigger kill_items","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"- removes all item entities in the plot","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"/trigger wipe_plot","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"- removes and drops all blocks","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"/trigger reload_plot","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"- reloads the plot and your data","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
"]

[[{"text":"^","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false,"clickEvent":{"action":"change_page","value":"2"}},{"text":"      RECIPES","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
